name: Reflex Jump
description:
Get Jumping with Reflex Jump! 

Jumping and avoiding obstacles moving with speed should help increase your reflexes. Beware, the speed goes on increasing.

This app promotes an #ad-freecampaign. The purpose of this campaign is to relive the ad-free era where developers used to make games for the fun of everyone without those annoying ads.

You can support the developer and the #ad-freecampaign by buying a coffee on kofi:
https://ko-fi.com/iamnexxed
